references.paper_title: Phi-3 technical report: A highly capable language model locally on your phone
references.reason: This paper introduces a powerful language model that serves as a strong baseline for comparison in evaluating AI models' performance.
This is a crucial reference as Claude serves as a primary evaluation model in this paper's analysis.

references.paper_title: PaliGemma: A versatile 3B VLM for transfer
references.reason: This paper introduces a versatile vision-language model that allows for comprehensive comparison and analysis of performance in multimodal tasks.

references.paper_title: Are we on the right way for evaluating large vision-language models?
references.reason: This paper provides a critical analysis of the current methods used for evaluating large vision-language models, guiding the methodology adopted in this research.

references.paper_title: Training verifiers to solve math word problems
references.reason: This paper is highly relevant as it introduces a benchmark for evaluating mathematical reasoning abilities of AI models, which is directly compared to the proposed Korean benchmark.
